The Most Rev. William Winter , a retired bishop of the Diocese of Pittsburgh , led the 100th anniversary Mass , which brought together about 200 parishioners and a few pastors who , at one time or another , were involved with the church .
It was a day that , in the eyes of several parishioners and clergymen , did not seem possible only eight years ago when fire destroyed the parish 's Poma Street church .

But like Transfiguration 's congregation has done on several occasions before and since the fire , the group banded together and found a solution , ultimately opening another church two years later along McKrell Road .
Its origins date to the early 20th century , when the people of West Deer successfully petitioned St. Mary of Czestochowa in New Kensington for a pastor to lead their own parish .

As things went along smoothly for close to another 50 years , the parish had a major setback in June 2006 when a car parked behind the church caught fire during a morning Mass .
As things went along smoothly for close to another 50 years , the parish had a major setback in June 2006 when a car parked behind the church caught fire during a morning Mass .
The flames spread to the church , eventually causing the roof to collapse .
For the next two years , Transfiguration held Mass in the McKrell Road school 's gymnasium as the congregation fought with the diocese to rebuild .
For the next two years , Transfiguration held Mass in the McKrell Road school 's gymnasium as the congregation fought with the diocese to rebuild .
Bishop David Zubik , according to Transfiguration 's self - written history , rejected the idea based on demographic studies of the area .
The parish endured another blow in 2008 when , because of declining enrollment , the diocese closed the school .
That 's when the parish began renovating the gymnasium as its place of worship and held its first Mass following construction in November of that year .

The Mass marked the final event for the church 's centennial celebration , which featured several special ceremonies during the past eight months .

Included in the centennial were events honoring public servants , veterans , the Knights of Columbus and the sacrament of marriage .
The Rev. James Holland , Transfiguration 's pastor , is planning to implement two programs at the church .

A clinical nurse specialist , Holland has been working with the University of Pittsburgh to establish a healthy lifestyles program , which he hopes to start by September .
